oauthlogin-desc: Allows users to authenticate through an external OAuth 2.0 provider.
oauthlogin-error-generic: OAuth login failed. Please try again or contact an administrator.
oauthlogin-error-state: The OAuth response could not be verified. Please start again.
oauthlogin-error-domain: Your email domain is not allowed to sign in here.
oauthlogin-error-token: The authorization code could not be exchanged for a token.
oauthlogin-error-userinfo: Your profile could not be loaded from the identity provider.
oauthlogin-success-body: You are now logged in as $1.
oauthlogin-missing-config: OAuthLogin is not configured. Set OAuth endpoints, client ID, client secret, and redirect URI in LocalSettings.php.
